job_title: Lead Python Engineer (GenAI, Full Stack Engineer)
jd: Hello ,My name is Gurdeep Singh and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our client Title - Lead Python Engineer (GenAI, Full Stack Engineer)Visa :: No H1b/CPTLocation :: Hybrid Sunnyvale, CADuration :: 6+ monthExperience :: 10+ yearsClient : WalmartNote:- Need local and strong profile Job Description:- RESOURCE MUST BE WILLING TO ROLL PERM IN 2-3 MONTHS. (WALMART WILL SPONSOR) 1. 8-10 YEARS OF PYTHON DEVELOPMENT EX INCLUDING 2-3 YEARS OF LEAD EXPERIENCE2. GENAI EXPERIENCE. (PLEASE INCLUDE IN SUB WHAT PROJECT THE RESOURCE USED GENAI AND WHAT THEIR SPECIFIC CONTRIBUTION.)3. FULL STACK DEVELOPMENT EX. 8+ Software Engineering experience3-5 years of experience of python if they have experience with another OO language thats great - Full Stack Ex. neededCloud experience - Azure - 2+ - won’t need to do the devops stuff but general artificats of a public cloud - if only just S3 buckets thats not enough but lambda, redshift or other data stores would be helpful.Experience with relational and document data stores such as MS SQL, PostgreSQL, or Firestore - not a must but if they struggle with writing queries that's a problemRelational data store experience Thanks & RegardsGurdeep SinghSr.Technical RecruiterE-Mail:Gsingh@sibitalent.comWebsite: www.sibitalent.com
